name: Happy Birthday Berry
description:
🎂 Happy Birthday Berry 🎂

Wish yah ....

  • All your future days be with vigorous and blooming shape and with your passionates. 🥳
  • Be the girl one impresses and  be the girl who the family to be proud of. 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
  • Be the one who can show her lovely smile every single seconds. 🥰
  • Be the one who will only meet and federate with loves not at the least with evils. 😇
  • Be the girl who will be cheerful with success of her ambitions. 🏆
  • Be the one who can decisively choose her sustainable favorites. 🪄

🎁 This is the game created for you as a birthday present 🎁
